member.name: ICatRegister.RegisterCategories
member.summary: Registers one or more component categories. Each component category consists of a CATID and a list of locale-dependent description strings.
member.param: The number of component categories to be registered.
An array of structures, one for each category to be registered. By providing the same CATID for multiple CATEGORYINFO structures, multiple locales can be registered for the same component category.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: One or more arguments are incorrect.

member.name: ICatRegister.RegisterClassImplCategories
member.summary: Registers the class as implementing one or more component categories.
member.param: The number of categories to be associated as category identifiers for the class.
An array of CATIDs to associate as category identifiers for the class.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: One or more arguments are incorrect.

member.name: ICatRegister.RegisterClassReqCategories
member.summary: Registers the class as requiring one or more component categories.
member.param: The number of category CATIDs to be associated as category identifiers for the class.
An array of CATIDs to be associated as category identifiers for the class.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: One or more arguments are incorrect.

member.name: ICatRegister.UnRegisterCategories
member.summary: Removes the registration of one or more component categories. Each component category consists of a CATID and a list of locale-dependent description strings.
member.param: The number of categories to be removed.
The CATIDs of the categories to be removed.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: One or more arguments are incorrect.

member.name: ICatRegister.UnRegisterClassImplCategories
member.summary: Removes one or more implemented category identifiers from a class.
member.param: The number of category CATIDs to be removed.
An array of CATIDs that are to be removed. Only the category IDs specified in this array are removed.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: One or more arguments are incorrect.

member.name: ICatRegister.UnRegisterClassReqCategories
member.summary: Removes one or more required category identifiers from a class.
member.param: The number of category CATIDs to be removed.
An array of CATIDs that are to be removed. Only the category IDs specified in this array are removed.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: One or more arguments are incorrect.

member.name: ICatRegister
member.summary: Provides methods for registering and unregistering component category information in the registry. This includes both the human-readable names of categories and the categories implemented/required by a given component or class.
